topic_name: The woman who unmasked the forger
image_credits: The Morgan Library & Museum, New York. By Paolatrabanco [CC BY-SA 4.0]
topic_description: In the 19th century, a forger of medieval art created works that today are more valuable unmasked than they would be if they were still thought to be originals. Medieval culture scholar Mary Wellesley takes us through the detective-like story of the woman who uncovered his deception.
music_credits: James Joshua Otto, Kai Engel, Greg Joy and Neil Cross
